system.description:
An aberration has a bizarre anatomy, strange abilities, an alien mindset, or any combination of the three.

Features: 8-sided Hit Dice; base attack bonus equal to Â¾ total Hit Dice (as cleric); good Will saves; skill points equal to (2 + Int modifier, minimum 1) per Hit Die, with quadruple skill points for the first Hit Die.

Traits: Aberrations eat, sleep, and breathe; proficient with natural weapons (if generally humanoid in form, also all simple weapons and any weapon described); darkvision out to 60 feet.
